Html:
I've just tried to publish my clubstarterkit(V3beta) to my site and I've received the following error. I'm at a loss as to what to fix here. Can anyone help?

"Configuration Error:

Parse Error Message: Unrecognized attribute 'restartOnExternalChanges'
Source Error:

<configuration>
<configSections>
<section name="SubSonicService" type="SubSonic.SubSonicSection, SubSonic" allowDefinition="MachineToApplication" restartOnExternalChanges="true" requirePermission="false"/>
<section name="urlrewritingnet" restartOnExternalChanges="true" requirePermission="false" type="UrlRewritingNet.Configuration.UrlRewriteSection, UrlRewritingNet.UrlRewriter"/>
<sectionGroup name="system.web.extensions" type="System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebExtensionsSectionGroup, System.Web.Extensions, Version=1.0.61025.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35">

Source File: D:\TeamHagerman\web.config Line: 4"

The connectionstrings.config file looks like this:

Source=.\SQLExpress;Integrated Security=true;AttachDBFileName=\\HNCSQLWEB\d$\TeamHagerman\App_Data\ClubDB.mdf;User Instance=True"
providerName="System.Data.SqlClient"/>

I ran into this problem as well.

To resolve the issue, I had to set the web application in IIS to use ASP.NET v2.0 instead of v1.1.
